śrīmat chanda pādakebhyaḥ namaḥ
śrī mīna sahaja ānandam svakīya aṅga samudbhavam
sarvam ādhāra gambhīram acalam vyāpakam param
māyā mala vinirmuktam mīnanātham namāmi aham
atha atas sampravakṣyāmi a kula vīram mahat bhūtam
guhyāt guhyataram guhyam siddha sadbhāva santatiḥ
anugrahāya lokānām siddha nāthena bhāṣitam
gopanīyam prayatnena yadi icchan śāśvatam padam
saṃsāra arṇava magnānām bhūtānām mahat āśrayam
yathā nadīnadāḥ sarve sāgare samupāgatāḥ
tathā a kula vīreṣu sarva dharmāḥ layaṅgatāḥ
sarva ādhāram aśeṣasya jagataḥ sarvadā prabhuḥ
sahaja ānandam na vindanti sarva dharma samāsṛtāḥ
a jānanta malaiḥ grastāḥ mahāmāyā andha chāditāḥ
śāstra jālena santuṣṭāḥ mohitāḥ tyajayanti tāḥ

nirākulam nirvikalpam nirguṇam ca su nirmalam
anātham sarva nātham ca pramāda unmāda varjitam
ghana nibiḍa niḥsandhi sthāvare jaṅgameṣu ca

original: jale jvalane tathā pavane bhūmyākāśe tathaiva ca || 92 ||
analyzed: jale jvalane tathā pavane bhūmi ākāśe tathā eva ca
sarvatra sama rasam kevalam

original: taṃ jñātaṃ yena dehasthaṃ sa muktaḥ sarvabandhanāt || 93 ||
analyzed: tam jñātam yena deha stham sa muktaḥ sarva bandhanāt

original: na tasya kriyābandhena na vedyaṃ na ca vedanā |
analyzed: na tasya kriyā bandhena na vedyam na ca vedanā

original: na yajño nopavāsaśca na caryā na kriyodayaḥ || 94 ||
analyzed: na yajñaḥ na upavāsaḥ ca na caryā na kriyā udayaḥ
na varṇaḥ varṇa bhedaḥ ca a kula vīram yad āgatam

original: na jāpo nārcanāgnīnāṃ na homo naiva sādhanam || 95 ||
analyzed: na jāpaḥ na arcanā agnīnām na homaḥ na eva sādhanam
na agnipraveśana antasya mantra pūjā ācaraṇa udakam

original: niyamāśca na tasyāsti kṣetrapīṭhe ca sevanaiḥ || 96 ||
analyzed: niyamāḥ ca na tasya asti kṣetra pīṭhe ca sevanaiḥ

original: na kriyā nārcanākādyairna tīrthāni vratāni ca |
analyzed: na kriyā na arcanā kādyaiḥ na tīrthāni vratāni ca
nirālamba padam śāntam tathā atītam nirañjanam
sarvajña paripūrṇam ca svabhāvena vilakṣyate
kārya kāraṇa nirmuktam a cintitam ca anāmayam
sva dehe saṃsthitam śāntam akula vīram tat ucyate
samastam ekadā abhūtam dvaita abhāva vivarjitam
a kula vīram mahat bhūtam asti nāsti vivarjitam
p
nā eva sva cetanā

original: na kālakalanā caiva na śaktiśca na cendriyaḥ || 101 ||
analyzed: na kāla kalanā ca eva na śaktiḥ ca na ca indriyaḥ

original: na bhūte gṛhyate so hi na duḥkhaṃ sukhameva ca |
analyzed: na bhūte gṛhyate saḥ hi na duḥkham sukham eva ca
na rasaḥ adhirasaḥ ca eva kṛtakam na eva kārakam  /

original: na cchāyā nātapo vahnirna ca śītoṣṇavedanā |
analyzed: na chāyā na ātapaḥ vahniḥ na ca śīta uṣṇa vedanā
na dinam rātrim iti uktam udaya astamana varjitam

original: na mano dṛśyate tatra norddhamadhyaṃ ca jñāyate |
analyzed: na manaḥ dṛśyate tatra na ūrddha madhyam ca jñāyate
akṣobhyam acalam śāntam īdṛśam tattva nirṇayam

original: yādṛśena tu bhāvena puruṣo bhāvayet sadā |
analyzed: yādṛśena tu bhāvena puruṣaḥ bhāvayet sadā
tādṛśam phalam āpnoti na atra kārya vicāraṇāt
evam ca kula sadbhāvam avācyam parama amṛtam
agamyam gamyate kasmāt bhrānti jñāna vimohitāḥ

original: na dūre nikaṭe caiva pratyakṣaṃ na parokṣatā |
analyzed: na dūre nikaṭe ca eva pratyakṣam na parokṣa tā

original: na bharito na rikto vā nipuṇo nāpi cādhikaḥ || 107 ||
analyzed: na bharitaḥ na riktaḥ vā nipuṇaḥ na api ca adhikaḥ
etat pakṣa vinirmuktaḥ hetu dṛṣṭānta varjitaḥ
kṛtakaiḥ mohitāḥ mūḍhāḥ karmakāṇḍa ratāḥ tu ye

original: na teṣāṃ muktiḥ saṃsāre narake yonisaṃkule |
analyzed: na teṣām muktiḥ saṃsāre narake yoni saṃkule
a kula vīram mahat bhūtam yadā paśyati sarva gam
sa bāhya abhyantara eka tvam sarvatra eva vyavasthitam
nistaraṅgam nirābhāsam pada cheda vivarjitam
sarva avayava nirmuktam nirvikāram ca nirmalam
adṛśyam nirguṇam nityam nirṇirodhan ca niścalam
p

original: na dhyānaṃ dhāraṇā naiva na sthānaṃ varṇameva ca |
analyzed: na dhyānam dhāraṇā nā eva na sthānam varṇam eva ca
na recakam pūrakam ca eva nara udghātam ca kumbhakam

original: na cāntamādimadhyasthaṃ na sato vṛddhireva ca |
analyzed: na ca antam ādi madhya stham na sataḥ vṛddhiḥ eva ca
grāhya grāhaka nirmukta grantha atītam ca yat bhavet
etaiḥ sarvaiḥ vinirmuktam hetu dṛṣṭānta varjitam
sa bāhya abhyantara eka tvam sarvatra eva vyavasthitam
samarasa ānanda rūpeṇa eka ākāram carācare
ye ca jñātam sva deha stham akula vīram mahat bhūtam

original: yasyā (?) vaśaṃ sthitaḥ kaścit samarasaṃ rasasaṃsthitam |
analyzed: yasyāḥ vaśam sthitaḥ kaścid samarasam rasa saṃsthitam

original: sa brahmā sa hariścaiva sa rudrañcai(ve)śvarastathā || 116 ||
analyzed: sa brahmā sa hariḥ ca eva sa rudran ca eva īśvaraḥ tathā

original: sa śivaḥ śāśvato devaḥ sa ca somārkaśaṅkaraḥ |
analyzed: sa śivaḥ śāśvataḥ devaḥ sa ca soma arka śaṅkaraḥ

original: sa viśākhyo mayūrākṣo arhanto budhameva ca || 117 ||
analyzed: sa viśākhyaḥ mayūra akṣaḥ arhantaḥ budham eva ca

original: svayaṃ devi svayaṃ devaḥ svayaṃ śiṣyaḥ svayaṃ guruḥ |
analyzed: svayam devi svayam devaḥ svayam śiṣyaḥ svayam guruḥ

original: svayaṃ dhyānaṃ svayaṃ dhyātā svayaṃ sarveśvaro guruḥ || 118 ||
analyzed: svayam dhyānam svayam dhyātā svayam sarva īśvaraḥ guruḥ
sarvajñaḥ sarvam āsṛtya sarvatas hita lakṣaṇaḥ

original: sarvayoginī tatrasthā sarve siddhāśca tatra vai || 119 ||
analyzed: sarva yoginī tatrasthā sarve siddhāḥ ca tatra vai

original: sarvaṃ sarvārthakaṃ caiva sarvajñānaśca tatra vai |
analyzed: sarvam sarva arthakam ca eva sarva jñānaḥ ca tatra vai
yathā asau mahārtham ca akulavīram iti smṛtam

original: śabdaḥ sparśo raso rūpaṃ gandho vadyāṇipama ca (?) |
analyzed: śabdaḥ sparśaḥ rasaḥ rūpam gandhaḥ ca

original: sarve bhīrāśca (?) tatraiva ye pralīnāḥ pralayaṃ gatāḥ || 121 ||
analyzed: sarve bhīrāḥ ca tatra eva ye pralīnāḥ pralayam gatāḥ  /

original: nādhāre dhyeyalakṣye ca na nādagocare pare |
analyzed: na ādhāre dhyeya lakṣye ca na nāda gocare pare

original: na hṛdi nābhikaṇṭhe vā vaktre ghaṇṭikarandhrayoḥ || 122 ||
analyzed: na hṛdi nābhi kaṇṭhe vā vaktre ghaṇṭika randhrayoḥ
p

original: na iḍā piṅgalā caiva suṣmaṇā ca gamāgamaiḥ |
analyzed: naḥ iḍā piṅgalā ca eva suṣmaṇā ca gama āgamaiḥ

original: na nābhicakre kaṇṭhe ca na śire binduke tathā || 123 ||
analyzed: na nābhi cakre kaṇṭhe ca na śire binduke tathā
cakṣu karṇa unmīlanam na evam nāsikā agra nirīkṣaṇe

original: na pūrake kumbhake caiva recake ca tathā punaḥ || 124 ||
analyzed: na pūrake kumbhake ca eva recake ca tathā punar

original: na bindubhedagranthau ca lalāṭe na ca candramāḥ |
analyzed: na bindu bheda granthau ca lalāṭe na ca candramāḥ

original: praveśe nirgame caiva śikhā ūrddhve na binduke || 125 ||
analyzed: praveśe nirgame ca eva śikhāḥ ūrddhve na binduke
na karaiḥ na saraiḥ mudraiḥ na ākāśe vāyu maṇḍale

original: na cāpe candrasūrye ca bhāvābhāve samāgame || 126 ||
analyzed: na cāpe candra sūrye ca bhāva abhāve samāgame
anaupamyam nirālambam pakṣa apakṣa vivarjitam
ajñāna mala grasta ātmā mahāmāyā vimohitāḥ
śāstra arthena vimuḍha ātmā mohitāḥ viduṣaḥ janāḥ

original: na vidanti padaṃ śāntaṃ kaivalyaṃ niṣkriyaṃ gurum || 128 ||
analyzed: na vidanti padam śāntam kaivalyam niṣkriyam gurum
saṃkhyā ādayaḥ ca ye kecid nyāya vaiśeṣikāḥ tathā
bauddha āra hantāḥ ca ye kecid soma siddhānta dakṣiṇāḥ
mīmāṃsā pañcarātrañca vāma dakṣiṇa kaulikāḥ
itihāsa purāṇāni bhūta tattvam ca gāruḍam

original: ete caiva samāḥ sarve kecit vā('pi) kriyānvitāḥ |
analyzed: ete ca eva samāḥ sarve kecid vā api kriyā anvitāḥ
vikalpa siddhi dāḥ sarve tat viduḥ na ca paṇḍitāḥ
vikalpa bahulāḥ sarve mithyāvāda nirarthakāḥ
na te mucyanti saṃsāre a kula vīra vivarjitāḥ
yāni kāni ca sthānāni giriḥ nagara sāgaram

original: sarvatra saṃsthitaṃ nityaṃ sthāvare jaṅgameṣu ca || 133 ||
analyzed: sarvatra saṃsthitam nityam sthāvare jaṅgameṣu ca
p
pañcabhūta ātmakam sarve yat kiñcid sacarācaram
śiva ādya deva paryantam sarvam tatra eva saṃsthitam

original: īdṛśaṃ yoginaṃ dṛṣṭvā upasarpanti ye narāḥ |
analyzed: īdṛśam yoginam dṛṣṭvā upasarpanti ye narāḥ
gandhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ ca dhūpaiḥ ca khāna pāna ādi bhakṣaṇaiḥ
tarpayanti ca ye bhaktāḥ trividhaiḥ ca eva antarātmanā

original: te'pi bandhaiḥ pramucyanti muktimārgī na (?) kāṅkṣiṇaḥ || 136 ||
analyzed: te api bandhaiḥ pramucyanti mukti mārgī na kāṅkṣiṇaḥ  /
brahma indra viṣṇu rudran ca buddham eva ca
viṣa ākhyaḥ mayūrākṣa ye ca ṛṣayaḥ tapodhanāḥ
deva ādibhyaḥ narendrāḥ ca ye ca anye mokṣa kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
te sarve mokṣam icchanti mokṣa dam
atha anyam saṃpravakṣyāmi bhinna avasthām svabhāva gaḥ
pūrvam yat uktā sarve anvaya mārge tu akaulike
parama amṛta santṛptāḥ sahaja ānandam ca kevalam

original: na jarāsteṣāṃ na mṛtyuśca na śoko duḥkhameva ca |
analyzed: na jarāḥ teṣām na mṛtyuḥ ca na śokaḥ duḥkham eva ca
sarva vyādhi haraḥ ca eva na punarbhava saṃbhavaḥ
akula vīram sthitam divyam siddha nātha prasādataḥ

original: sarvataḥ sarvadā śuddhaḥ sarvataḥ sarvadā prabhuḥ || 142 ||
analyzed: sarvatas sarvadā śuddhaḥ sarvatas sarvadā prabhuḥ

original: iti macchendrapādāvatārite kāmarūpisthāne yoginī prasādāllabdha(m) akulavīraṃ samāptam ||
analyzed: iti mad śa indra pāda avatārite kāmarūpi sthāne yoginī prasādāt labdham a kulavīram samāptam
